Ã‚Â·Nikolai Gogol burned the second half of Dead Souls after a religious conversion convinced him that literature was paganism.
Ã‚Â·Some of the thousand pages of William BurroughsÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s original Naked Lunch were stolen and sold on the street by Algerian street boys.
